required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Open Versus Closed Wedge Distal Femoral Varus Osteotomy for the Valgus Knee. Indications, Clinical and Radiological Outcome
clinical_study.official_title: Var_DFO:Open Versus Closed Wedge Distal Femoral Varus Osteotomy for the Valgus Knee. Indications, Clinical and Radiological Outcome

brief_summary.textblock: This study is to analyze the indications of the two most popular techniques of distal femoral osteotomy (DFO) performed in patients with valgus malalignment and symptomatic degenerative changes in the lateral compartment of the knee and to evaluate the clinical and radiological outcome of a case series of patients who have received this operation at the Department of Orthopaedics and Traumatology and the Department of Surgery of the University Hospital Basel.

primary_outcome.measure: Accuracy of the correction of the deformity
primary_outcome.description: The mechanical axis of the femur and the tibia and hence the mechanical tibiofemoral angle (MFTA) will be measured pre- and postoperatively. (the goal of the operation is a neutral alignment, MFTA angle of 0°)

secondary_outcome.description: Information regarding the incidence of disruptive hardware and of hardware removal operations because of this, time needed until bony union is achieved, complications, delayed and non-union rates and need of conversion to arthroplasty

Information regarding pain levels measured with visual analog scale score (VAS). The visual analogue scale (VAS) is a scale used to determine the pain intensity experienced by individuals. It consists of a line, approximately 10-15 cm in length, with the left side signifying no pain with a smiling face image and the right side signifying the worst pain.

secondary_outcome.measure: pain medication intake preoperatively and at the final follow up
secondary_outcome.description: pain medication intake preoperatively and at the final follow up

arm_group.arm_group_label: OWDFO: Open Wedge Distal Femoral Varus osteotomy
CWDFO: Closed Wedge Distal Femoral Varus osteotomy

intervention.intervention_name: Data collection from routine medical records
intervention.description: Data collection from routine medical records (clinical and radiological data)
intervention.arm_group_label: CWDFO: Closed Wedge Distal Femoral Varus osteotomy
OWDFO: Open Wedge Distal Femoral Varus osteotomy

study_pop.textblock: All patients who received a DFO for valgus knee arthritis at the Clinic of Orthopaedics and Traumatology at the University Hospital Basel between 1.1.2013 and 31.12.2017 will be included in this study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patients who received a distal femoral osteotomy (DFO) for valgus knee osteoarthritis between 1.1.2013 and 31.12.2017
Exclusion Criteria:
- Absence of informed consent
- Absence of X-Rays documenting the preoperative deformity or postoperative result

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Orthopaedics and Traumatology, University Hospital Basel

facility.name: Clinic for Orthopaedics and Traumatology, University Hospital basel

clinical_study.keyword: Closed Wedge Distal Femoral Varus Osteotomy (CWDFO)
Open Wedge Distal Femoral Varus Osteotomy (OWDFO)
